paper.title: SELF-ATTENTIVE SENTIMENTAL SENTENCE EMBEDDING FOR SENTIMENT ANALYSIS
paper.abstract: We propose the use of a word-level sentiment bidirectional LSTM in tandem with the self-attention mechanism for sentence-level sentiment prediction. In addition to the proposed model, we also present a finance report dataset for sentence-level financial risk detection. Experiments conducted on the proposed dataset together with two public review datasets attest the effectiveness of our model for sentence sentiment prediction.

domain_result.justification: 该论文提出了一种用于句子级情感预测的模型，并特别提到其在一个金融报告数据集上的应用，用于金融风险检测。这表明其核心技术应用于金融风险管理领域。
